Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.1 Paṭiccavāra » 21.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 21.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Namaggādi
Ajjhattattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Namaggādi
14.
2785Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati namaggapaccayā…  (nahetusadisaṃ. Moho natthi) nasampayuttapaccayā…  navippayuttapaccayā—  arūpe…pe…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ…pe… . (1)
2786Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—  arūpe…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ…pe…  nonatthipaccayā, novigatapaccayā.
<< Najhānaup21.1.2.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
